description: Nadeshiko`s real identity is that of a boy named Fujisaki Nagihiko, called "Nagi" as a nickname by Amu and the girls. It is tradition in the Fujisaki family for males to be raised as females as part of their training so that they may play female roles in Japanese dance. Nagihiko`s secret is known by his family, Kukai, Tadase, the school`s principal Amakawa Tsukasa.
name: Fujisaki Nagihiko
